title: NASA spacecraft were vulnerable to hacking for 3 years and nobody knew. AI found and fixed the flaw in 4 days
description: An AI start-up has found a vulnerability in security software protecting NASA's ground control communications with satellites in space.
content: An AI start-up has found a vulnerability in security software protecting NASA's ground control communications with satellites in space.
